column2: 2. Consists of scenic and sightseeing transportation; transportation support activities;
3. Intangible assets include patents, trademarks, and franchise agreements, but not copyrights.

5. Consists of bank and other holding companies.
Note. Estimates in this table are based on the 1997 North American Industry Classification
